turns.content: But it can also be a statement to the community, with open mic and all. But I am sure it will live, even after we leave Sheffield. In the hearts of people, and maybe, just maybe..as a real grownup sandbox in the shape of a volleyball court. We'll see!! This summerin Sheffield! Gotta send this, I'll let you know how it went!!

That sounds amazing! Best of luck with your project, and please keep me updated on how it goes. I'm excited to hear about the progress and the impact it will have on the Sheffield community. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or ideas!
